name: 100 Times Greater Power
effect:
Target: "Choji Akimichi" + "Secret Pills"
Effect: Discard the top X cards of your Deck to multiply the target's original printed Power by X during this turn.
"I'm a hundred times stronger than in the previous state!"

name: Admonition
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's "Genin" Ninjas
Effect: Place the target in any of your opponent's Teams.
"Sasuke, forget about your revenge."

name: Aerial Dynamic Marking
effect:
Requirements: "Akamaru"
Effect: Draw 1 card at random from any position of either player's Decks, look at it, and return it either to the top or bottom of the same Deck.
"Way to go, Akamaru! That was perfect!"

name: Akamaru
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Dog | Animal | Growth
[FOUR AGAINST TWO]
Valid: While "Kiba Inuzuka" is in the same Team as this Ninja, that "Kiba Inuzuka" gets +1/+0.
"Arf! Arf!"

name: Anbu Days
effect:
Permanent (3):
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: Attach this card to the target. The target's name is changed to "Anbu" and it's printed Power becomes 4/2 (Healthy status) and 2/1 (Injured status). (If you attach this card to your opponent's Ninja, they control this card.)
"I used to be a member of Anbu".

name: Aoi Rokusho
effect:
Rain | Jonin | Male
[IMPEDER]
When this Ninja's Team wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory, move 1 of your opponent's Battle Rewards, if they have any, to its original owner's Chakra area.
"Now you can neither run nor stand up ..."

name: Application of the First Stage
effect:
Target: Every Ninja with a "Water" symbol Battling against the user
Effect: Remove the target from its Team. The target becomes a Stand-by Ninja.
"It's an application of the first stage of my Rasengan training!"

name: Asuma Sarutobi & Kurenai Yuhi
effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Male | Female | Platoon | Mental Power: 1
[FIGHTING TOGETHER]
While this Ninja is in your hand and you have "Asuma Sarutobi" in play, this Ninja gets -1 Entrance cost. If this Ninja is put in play while you have "Kurenai Yuhi" in play, place 1 Growth coin on this Ninja.
"Look sharp! Something's wrong!!" "Yes .... It's too quiet ...!"

name: Black Seal
effect:
Requirements: "The Four Sound Ninja"
Effect: During this turn, if the effect of your "Four Black Mists Formation" Jutsu card has been applied, select up to X number of the cards in your opponent's hand at random and return them to the bottom of their original owner's Deck. X = the number of your in-play "The Four Sound Ninja" Ninjas times 2.
"...OK, it's settled for now."

name: Blade of the Thunder God
effect:
Requirements: "Weapon" Combat Attribute
Target: 1 Jutsu card being played
Effect: Negate and discard the target. In addition, the Combat of the target's user becomes 0 during this turn.
"This Blade of the Thunder God can slash anything."

name: Blind Corner
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: "Byakugan" of every Ninja (if they have it) is negated.
"However, ...somehow, there are certain Kunai Knives he cannot avoid."

name: Booby Trap
effect:
Target: 1 of the cards in your opponent's Discard Pile
Effect: Return the target to the top of its original owner's Deck.
"It's a smoke bomb with pepper! Don't approach it, or you'll trigger a disaster!"

name: Boss Jirocho
effect:
Wasabi Family | Boss | Male
Effect: At the beginning of your turn, if you and your opponent have the same number of Battle Rewards, you can draw 1 card.
"It was decided that the leader of our town should be chosen by a competition rather than a fight."

name: Bossy Attitude
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: During this turn, if the target is sent out to Battle, it must be sent out as a Head Ninja, if possible.
"Alright, everyone! Follow me!!"

name: Bravado
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: Designate a Jutsu card name. When this card is sent to your Chakra area, search your deck for one copy of the designated Jutsu card, show it to your opponent and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"Three days is enough for me to master this kind of Jutsu!" "Remember that and don't go back on your word!"

name: Butterfly Bullet Bomb
effect:
Requirements: "Choji Akimichi" + "Secret Pills"
Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Give 1 Damage to the target. Discard the user at the end of the turn.
"All my chakra into... my left hand"

name: Chidori
effect:
Requirements: "Sasuke Uchiha" or "Kakashi Hatake"
Target: User
Effect: Target gets +5/+0 during the turn. In addition, if the target's Team wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory, you win 1 Battle Reward.
"I'll finish this with one blow!"

name: Chidori
effect:
Requirements: "Sasuke Uchiha" or "Kakashi Hatake"
Target: User
Effect: The target gets +5/+0 during this turn. In addition, if the target's Team wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory, draw 1 card.
"The chakra actually becomes visible, and gives off that distinctive sound that you hear... Like birds chirping..."

name: Choji Akimichi
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Growth
[THE LAST PIECE]
Valid: While your opponent has 4 or more Battle Rewards, this Ninja gets +2/+0.
"The pleasure of this last piece of meat is allowed only to me!"

name: Choji Akimichi
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Growth
[THE MOST SECRET PILLS]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can search for 1 "The Triad Colored Pills" Mission card in your Deck, show it to your opponent, and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"Yes ... I have a card up my sleeve ..."

name: Combination
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: Every Team with only 2 Ninjas gets +X Team Power. X = the total Entrance cost of both Ninjas in that Team divided by 2 (round down).
"Let's beat Orochimaru here now!"

name: Combined Transformation
effect:
Requirements: "Naruto Uzumaki & Gamabunta"
Effect: Place this Jutsu card as a Ninja with Power of 9/9 in any position in the user's Team. Send this Jutsu (Ninja) card to your Chakra area when it receives any Damage or at the end of the turn.
"A combined transformation!"

name: Dedication Ceremony
effect:
Permanent
Effect: When either player wins a total of 5 or more Battle Rewards, discard this card. In that case, the player draws 4 cards and moves 2 cards from their hand to their Chakra area. This card cannot be played when you have 3 or more Battle Rewards.
"You mean the competition is ..." "Yes, the Dedication Ceremony held at Todoroki Great Shrine every four years."

name: Desperate Persuasion
effect:
Permanent
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas
Effect: Attach this card to the target. Flip a Ninja Blade coin at the beginning of each Battle Phase; If it's heads, the target cannot be sent out to Battle during the turn. If it's tails, move this card to its original owner's Discard Pile.
"So ... please stay here!!"

name: Determination to Avenge
effect:
Target: Your in-play "Sasuke Uchiha"
Effect: If your opponent does not have "Sasuke Uchiha" in play, move the target to their Village and send up to 2 of their Battle Rewards to their original owner's Chakra area.
"Let's go ...... to start everything!!"

name: Digital Shrapnel
effect:
Requirements: "Kimimaro"
Target: Every Injured Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Give 1 Damage to the target.
"Ten Finger Bullets!!"

name: Disappointment
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: Every time a Ninja is put in play, put a Ninja Blade coin symbolizing -1/-1 on it.
"Sure enough, this kid has no talent whatsoever."

name: Earth Style Barrier: Earth Dome Prison
effect:
Requirements: "Jirobo"
Effect: Select and discard up to X number of your opponent's Chakras. Then, move the same number of cards from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area. X = the number of your opponent's Ninjas Battling against the user.
"Leave them to me. I want to recover as much as possible."

name: Earth Style: Ball of Graves
effect:
Requirements: "Jirobo"
Target: Every Ninja with a Combat value of 3 or less Battling against the user
Effect: Give 1 Damage to the target.

name: Earth Style: Dark Swamp
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's Head Ninjas
Effect: In the calculation of the Team Power of the target's Team, apply the target's Support value instead of its Combat value during this turn.
"Now, even the giant snake cannot make a move."

name: Earth Style: Terra Shield
effect: Effect: During this turn, if your opponent wins 1 or more Battle Rewards as a result of the Showdown, select up to 2 of their Battle Rewards at random and move them to their original owner's Discard Pile afterwards.
"Earth Style: Terra Shield!!"

name: Emergency
effect:
Permanent
Effect: During the Organization Phase, no "Genin" Ninjas can be included in the same Team as 1 or more "Chunin" or higher Rank Ninjas.
"Except for the minimum personnel required in the Village, most Jonin are away on missions."

name: Extraordinary Power
effect:
Requirements: "Tsunade"
Target: User
Effect: User gets +3/+0 during this turn. In addition, if the target's Team wins a Victory, it becomes an Outstanding Victory.

name: Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu
effect:
Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Change the target to injured status. X (the Jutsu cost) must be the same as the number of Ninjas in the target and can only be paid by Chakras with a "Fire" symbol.

name: Flying Swallow
effect:
Requirements: "Asuma Sarutobi"
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas Battling against the user

name: Forbidden Word
effect: Effect: Designate a Jutsu or a Mission card name. Then, look at all the cards in your opponent's hand and discard all the cards with the designated name.

name: Four Black Mists Formation
effect:

name: Fukusuke Hikyakuya
effect:
Wasabi Family | Male
Effect: At the beginning of your turn, if your opponent has 6 or more Battle Rewards, you can send this Client to your Chakra area to draw 2 cards.

name: Gaara of the Desert
effect:
Sand | Genin | Male
[SAND PROTECTION]
When this Ninja receives 1 or more Damage on a single occasion, discard the same amount of your Chakra. Then, negate the Damage. If you can not, this Ninja receives Damage as usual.

name: Gaara of the Desert
effect:
Sand | Genin | Male

Valid: When this Ninja is removed from play by the effect of your opponent's Ninjas or Jutsu cards, you can select and discard 1 of your other Ninjas in this Ninja's Team instead. In that case, this Ninja cannot be removed from play by the effect of your opponent's Ninjas or Jutsu cards during the turn.
"When we finally fight... it won't be to advance to the next stage, but solely for survival. One seeking to destroy the other."

name: Gaara of the Desert (Possessed Mode)
effect:
Sand | Genin | Male | Name: Garra of the Desert
[ASPECT OF THE MONSTER]
Valid: This Ninja can only be put in play when you discard your in-play "Gaara of the Desert" with "An Entrance cost of 2 or lower" and 2 of your Chakra with a "Wind" Symbol during your Mission Phase.
When this Ninja becomes the user of a Jutsu card, you can pay 2 more Chakra in addition to its Jutsu cost. In that case, that Jutsu card cannot be negated.

name: Game
effect: Effect: Your opponent flips a Ninja Blade coin twice and discards the same number of cards in their hand as the number of times they get tails. If they get heads both times, you discard 2 of the cards in your hand.

name: Genma Shiranui
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Male

effect:
Requirements: "Zabuza Momochi"

effect:

If you do not, move this Mission (Ninja) card to the Discard Pile.

Leaf | Genin | Female | Growth | Mental Power: 1

effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Genin | Male | Female | Platoon | Mental Power: 1

name: Instant Killing
effect:

name: Intruder
effect: Effect: During this turn and the next turn, the card text of every in-play "Permanent" Mission card is negated.

name: Irresistible!
effect:
Permanent (3)

name: Itachi Uchiha
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Sharingan Eye

name: Itachi Uchiha
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Sharingan Eye

name: Iwashi Tatami
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Male

name: Jiraiya
effect:
Leaf | Sannin | Male

effect:
Leaf | Sannin | Male | Female | Medical | Platoon | Mental Power: 3

Sound | Male | The Four Sound Ninja | Growth

Leaf | Genin | Male | Sharingan Eye

Leaf | Jonin | Male | Sharingan Eye

effect: Effect: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's Deck. Then, return them in the same order.

Leaf | Genin | Male | Ninja Dog | Animal | Platoon

Sound | Male | The Four Sound Ninja | Growth

effect:
Sound | Male

name: Konohamaru
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Male

Any "Jonin" or higher Rank non-"Platoon" Ninja(s) with a "Lightning" Symbol in your hand gets -1 Hand cost.

name: Leaf Squad Organized!
effect: Effect: Search the top 5 cards of your Deck for 1 each of "Naruto Uzumaki" + "Genin", "Neji Hyuga" + "Genin", "Shikamaru Nara" + "Chunin" or lower Rank, "Choji Akimichi" + "Genin" and "Kiba Inuzuka" + "Genin" Ninja cards. Show them to your opponent and put them in play. Then, return the rest, if there are any, to your Deck and shuffle it.

name: Lifelong Promise
effect:
Permanent (3)

name: Mind Awakening Pill

Permanent (3)

name: My Rule

Permanent (3)

(2) You cannot use any Jutsu or Mission cards.

name: Perimeter Barrier
effect: Effect: During the next turn, every Ninja is put in play in injured status.

name: Pretty Please!

Permanent (2)

effect:

effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Male

Permanent
